name: Monster Truck Story
description:
Created in 72 hours as a part of Ludum Dare 33: "You Are the Monster." During the game jam, we split the team and made two projects simultaneously, the other coming in the form of Pet Rock FriendClub.

Control a toy monster truck through a city of kids' toys. Run amok and become the product of your sister's nightmares!

Most of the team was comprised of members of PolyKnight Games. We're currently working on our first commercial game, InnerSpace, which we've spent much more than 48-hours developing.

While Monster Truck Story is free, any donations will go towards the development of InnerSpace.

If you like it, let us know!
